Articles.Content: It looks kind of awkward on the Kerbals. Like someone is carrying a little stove on their back. But that's just my opinion.

It looks kind of awkward on the Kerbals. Like someone is carrying a little stove on their back. But that's just my opinion.

yeah i know, that's why i didn't want to be too large so that it wouldn't look unwieldy but i am trying to make it's functionality make up for it
It's good if you add parachutes in case if you thow a kerbal in low orbit in an atmosphere to surive and get recovered(on Kerbin) and why they cannot make rockkets with their hands

I tested this.

yes, although i still struggle with trying to figure out textures

I might be able to help, I'm not much good. PM me if your interested.

ok i'll think about it although ight now i just realized that my modell could still use a little work as it has a crap load of unnecessary sides that i need remove plus when i tried texturing, it would map out the interior sides too so i need to fix that....

ok Update

i fixed the model but right now i need to make a decision....

i hhave made two separate models of the rucksack: one with a camera and one without

not the final camera although i designed it in case i ever try animating (assuming i figure texturing anytime soon)
If the camera supports hullcam, use it. I dunno why but it would be quite fun to do EVA's with the little camera

If the camera supports hullcam, use it. I dunno why but it would be quite fun to do EVA's with the little camera

i was actually thinking of adding lazors along with hullcam

ok update

now have confirmed that i have the uv maps somewhat done although since i absolutely suck at texturing (trust me on that) i need a guy to help although i am pretty sure that last guys that asked are doing their own thing so i am offering the position up again for anyone although the first i accept will be texture artist even if i get multiple entries due to the chaos of last time so yeah
